title: Design Your Revolution
desc: ENZA ACADEMY  Enza Academy is a youth innovation and leadership incubator that fights for racial and economic justice by empowering low-opportunity, high-potential youth of color with the technical skills and social consciousness to build bold solutions to big challenges in their own communities using the force of their own imaginations. ? DESIGN YOUR REVOLUTION  Design Your Revolution is a three day immersive social impact innovation and entrepreneurship hackcamp ?for ?low-opportunity high school youth of color . DYR will empower Enzavators (students) through a three part computer science, social justice, and business sense curriculum. Enzavators ?will walk away with skills in entrepreneurship, innovation, coding, website development, branding, pitching, product and business development. ? ? Pitch Night? The finale event on Sunday, December 13th is Pitch Night, ?an opportunity to network, with VCs, startup founders, industry professionals, and many others from across New York City. Enzavator teams will pitch their breakthrough innovations ?to a panel of established entrepreneurs and industry leaders for seed cash and the opportunity to bring their idea to reality. ? ? Judges ? ? We believe in the creative force of our youth of color, and our mission is to unlock that potential for the world to see.   We hope you can make it! Cheers, Enza Academy
